body:
lcur_Example CURSOR FOR
		SELECT	*
		FROM	TABLE_EXAMPLE
		WHERE\CONDITION_1	= CONDITION_OTHER
		AND	\CONDITION_2			= CONDITION_OTHER
		FOR UPDATE;

lcur_Example CURSOR FOR
		SELECT	COLUMN_EXAMPLE
		FROM	TABLE_NAME
		WHERE	CONDITION_1		= CONDITION_OTHER;

FOR lrec_ReservePartner IN (
		SELECT	*
		FROM	TABLE_NAME
		WHERE	CONDITION_1	= CONDITION_1
		AND		CONDITION_2	= CONDITION_2
		ORDER BY COLUM_NAME
	) LOOP

IF ($1) THEN
ELSIF
ELSE
END IF;
CASE WHEN COLUMNDATA.EXAMPLE = '0' THEN COLUMNDATA.EXAMPLE ELSE COLUMNDATA.EXAMPLE2 END
